resources.string: Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.\n\nConsider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own!

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.

I was born and raised in Miaoli, Taiwan. Graduated from the department of Mechanical Engineering,National Taiwan University Learned a lot of theories and being able to prove myself that I can apply my abilities in the field. I have great interest in learning technical innovations. Assemble computer by myself, sports, programming language and machines are also my hobbies, and I like coding to solve problem. I am an easygoing and responsible person who like to work with others. Use elastica theory to study the deformation and stability of a rod under prescribed end twist of magnitude 1.238 and then under the action of axial load. And I use shooting method to solve for the static deformation and then the vibration frequencies. From the calculated frequencies we can determine the stability of the static deformation. As a result, the behavior or the rod under prescribed axial displacement can be predicted. Both non-self-contact and self-contact deformations are studied in detail.
